name: Christopher Aseltine
text: Super fast, staff was friendly and the pizza was excellent! I haven’t been to Hungry Howie's since I was a kid so I wasn’t sure what to expect. I will definitely be adding this to my preferred restaurants.

name: Chang Feng Hsun
text:
The clerk was friendly enough to customize my pizza. I love the butter cheese and garlic flavored crust.
They have a wall describing their history, whichbus interesting to me as a foreigner.

name: Noha Yousef
text: Great service

name: Marissa A.
text: This place makes and delivers the best pizza, so fast, it is amazing. I’m not sure how they do it! When we get extra cheese, that pizza is out of this world good. I’m pretty sure Jesus himself makes the pizza and the angels deliver it. It …More

name: Brett A
text: This is my go-to pizza place.  Quick Delivery (I live only 2 miles away).  The pizza also tastes great 4 out of 5 times we order.  Sometimes variable on the crust taste (usually get butter and garlic herb, sometimes has a fishy taste. …More

name: Stewart Tubbs
text: We have searched and searched for a really good Pizza. After trying several brands we have been ordering Hungry Howie's just about every Friday night for the last year or so. It is consistently delicious Pizza. This makes my mouth water just writing about it.

name: Kelli Lane
text:
Taryn..And the young man with the Cool Swearshirt with the Roses on it... Yes we were:
Late night Hungry, new to area...a bit undecided...BUT YOUR AMAZING DEALS HELPED …More

name: Vickie Boyer
text: Love their pizza and crazy bread. Prices are great for a working Mom.

name: Dark Angel
text: The staff is really nice here. I took one step in and I was surprised to see someone in excitedly greeting me. It was a totally different from experience than whenever I go get food at another fast food joint. Usually they look like they'd …More

name: Richard Mcdaniel
text: Great pizza as always. They make a pizza that is never undercooked, with my favorite green olives.

name: Eric Therrian
text: Relatively fast and always a consistent product time after time. Great stop for lunch without burning up a ton of time. Will be back.

name: Daniel Bronson
text: Hungry Howie's is a great place to get a bite to eat. The employees here are lovely and kind with warm, heartfelt welcome. The food here is excellent to eat, and if you enjoy the flavored crust, Hungry Howie's is the place for you, the general manager received the manager of the year award.

name: Daniel Chavez
text: Dan Bronson is absolutely cool. Give him a raise! Will definitely return when in town.

name: Akim Prosperity of The King
text: One of my favorite pizzas, customers service needs work. But pizza is good when its fresh.

name: Jeff Pollack
text: Over all it tastes okay and service is good though, the sauce tastes like it is loaded with sugar. The sugar sauce is the only reason i down vote.

name: JAsian
text: Always fast, friendly and accurate.

name: Jeffrey Ma
text: Fast, friendly service and good food at cheap prices. Not much of a dine-in area but that's not what you're here for anyways.

name: Forget-Me-Not Lawn Care
text: I really wish you guys would come to Cincinnati, OH. The Howie Maui is the best Hawaiian pizza I've ever had. Great service is an added bonus!

name: Philip Lingle
text: Great value for lunch.

name: Jo Hernandez
text: Showed up right before closing and the staff was very welcoming. The pizza was great and well priced. Recommend the Howie breads

name: Thomas Magill
text: Never had a bad pizza at this location in 25 years.

name: Checkered Flag Interactive Media
text: Staff inside was nice and have had some good pizza! A couple months ago though one of their marked delivery cars blew multiple red lights on  Washtenaw and then did donuts in their parking lot.. stopped in and they were higher than kites.. not cool.

name: Thomas Sweet
text: Great pizza at a great price

name: Jason Boore
text: I love this place! Great service, great food, and great prices. Please stay in the Plymouth Rd area forever Hungry Howie's.

name: Steve D
text: Had the deep dish meat eaters pizza with butter cheese crust. It was amazing, possibly one of the best pizzas I've ever had!

name: Jennifer Dunn
text: They have excellent pizza and if you haven’t tried the cookie you are missing out. The staff are really friendly and I love the driver Joe.

name: Roger Trerice
text: I get the same pizza and it is cooked fine or just oil.  :-(

name: Kenneth Wimbley
text: Food so good

name: Ashwin P.P
text: Good pizza. Not a lot of space to dine in.

name: Andy Beauchene
text: Great for a quick dinner or when you don't have time to cook.

name: Por Shay
text: Great location! Team handle their business.

name: Shariff Hunter
text: I never have a problem here. The pizza is always good and the employees are cheery.

name: stefanotw
text: Compared to other pizza places in the area, this place is better than all of them by a landslide

name: Dave
text: I like the crust the best

name: Rohan Gawande
text: Loved the pizza..

name: Vallaney Rice
text: Best chicken bacon ranch subs..

name: Geoffrey Palmieri
text: The best pizza chain out there

name: Isaac Milstain
text: Pizza ok, the staff is not friendly.

name: Ms. Anonymous
text: Love the flavored crust pizzas!

name: Terry Whitfield Sr
text: Just fair

name: Krystal Henderstein
text: It's really good pizza , great breadsticks and Howie bread!!!!!

name: Treetrunk Thompson
text: Very good!

name: TIMOTHY JOHNSON
text: Nest pizza in fenton

name: j S
text: Cant beat lunch deal

name: Barb Cilley
text: Cook the pizza longer

name: MellyMellBx Lee
text: Awesome customer service

name: Sean Heard
text: Served Fresh!

name: Ian Springsteen
text: Average

text: Fire

name: Steven Zou
text: Eh its alright

name: margaret paul
text: Thieves!!!

text: Loved it
